AboutMe.title: < About Me />
AboutMe.first: Hello, my name is Erwan Pellerin and I'm a
AboutMe.job: junior Full-Stack Web and Mobile developer
AboutMe.firstbis: .  I worked as a psychomotor therapist for 8 years in medical-social structures, a job that requires curiosity, adaptation, creativity, stress management and good listening and observation skills.
AboutMe.second: I've had a passion for computers and new technologies ever since I was a child. After I have started coding in Python as a self-taught person, my taste for programming led me to the path of professional reconversion. I joined the
AboutMe.secondBis: club in January 2023 and trained at
AboutMe.secondTer: school from April to October 2023. This bootcamp enabled me to acquire solid skills as a Full-Stack Web and Mobile developer.

Projects.title: < Projects />
Projects.head: Here you can see some of the projects I've created during the course. In addition to the applications' functionalities, I strive to integrate concepts that I consider essential, such as accessibility (WCAG), interactivity and security, into my creations.

Courses.title: < Courses />
Courses.subtitle: Web and Mobile Application Designer - April to October 2023 - Part-time
Courses._2item: Development and deployment of a Node.js back-end project,
Courses._5item: Development and deployment of a React.js web front-end project,
Courses._6item: Development and deployment of a React Native mobile front-end project,
Courses._7item: Creating a web project with the Next 12 / 13 framework,
Courses.openClass_4: Secure your web applications with OWASP
Courses._timeVivreDuCode: Registered since January 2023, online  learning is done at our own pace
Courses._3VivreDuCode: Installing and using a Linux virtual machine with Virtual Box

Ressources.title: < Ressources />
Ressources.description: In this section, I share resources that I've used to deepen my programming skills, but also on broader topics in the world of computing.
